FX.name: ParticleR
FX.description: This is a unique complex reverb.

Parameters.name: Mode
Parameters.explanation: Sets how the reverb sound changes.

Parameters.name: Decay
Parameters.explanation: Sets the duration of the reverberations.

Parameters.name: Mix
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the amount of effected sound that is mixed with the original sound.

Parameters.name: Tail
Parameters.explanation: When ON, effect sound continues even after effect is turned off. When OFF, effect sound stops right when effect is turned off.
